claim: the name of the visitor in vancouver on february 24 , be winnipeg

2. Check the dates for all entries to find February 24th. This will give us the row index of the relevant entry.
3. Once we have the row index, use that value to find the visitor's name in the corresponding row under the "visitor" column.
4. Compare the visitor's name found in step 3 with the city "Winnipeg". Determine whether they are equal or not.
